folder: Arthur Kill Road & Futurity Place, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Futurity Place
text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Futurity Place and Token Street, showing the ruins of the Bedell Home. The house was built in 1670.

About 1905 (?)

By Eugene C. Putnam
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
